theTimer() - Method in class main.Game
Starts a timer for both players in an asynchronous task.
Timer - Class in dataBase
This class runs in an asynchronous task which sleeps for one second and then counts -1 to the PlayerDatas.getTimer() for each player.
Timer(PlayerDatas, JLabel, JFrame) - Constructor for class dataBase.Timer
Starts new asynchronous thread which runs the timer.
